currentContext.content: CLAUDED MODEL PICKER FIX - Complete solution saved at ~/Desktop/Projects/komplete-kontrol-cli/FINAL-FIX-INSTRUCTIONS.md. Patch: patch-model-picker-http.cjs. Test: test-models-loaded.sh. Root cause: curl timeout. Solution: Node http module. Status: VERIFIED WORKING (15/15 models).

episodes.description: Claude Code /model picker cannot be modified - it's hardcoded in minified CLI
episodes.details: Tried multiple patch approaches. The RU3() function is minified and hardcoded. claudish doesn't modify picker, uses --model flag instead. Recommend using separate /model commands or --model flag rather than modifying picker.

episodes.description: Clauded model picker now shows all 15 models from proxy
episodes.details: Root cause: curl subprocess timeout. Solution: Node http module with busy-wait. Verified working: 15/15 models load at CLI startup.

facts.value: ~/.claude/clauded-cli/cli.js uses HTTP module to fetch models from http://127.0.0.1:3000/v1/models at startup

patterns.trigger: clauded model picker not showing all models
patterns.solution: Check if execSync+curl is timing out. Replace with Node http.get() using busy-wait pattern. Verify with: ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:3000 node -e 'require(~/.claude/clauded-cli/cli.js)'
